name: Send emails stored in Google Sheets using Restdb.io
description: Make will watch for new records in a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet at regular intervals and send emails using Restdb.io. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FwIsRB-AiBFYON6tBIrKtcTHFD3WWD97lzA5G-QoCnY/edit?usp=sharing).
